com.raceup.ed.bms.stream

Class ArduinoSerial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raceup.ed.bms.stream.ArduinoSerial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bms

    public class ArduinoSerial
extends java.lang.Object
implements gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener
    Manage arduino byte stream

      • close

        protected void close()
              throws java.io.IOException
        This should be called when you stop using the port. This will prevent port locking on platforms like Linux.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when streams cannot be found

      • serialEvent

        public void serialEvent(gnu.io.SerialPortEvent oEvent)
        Handle an event on the serial port. Read the data and print it.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
